section.heading: Dead bodies for burial at public expense to be reported to Board; removal; exceptions.

annotations.annotation: Anatomical Board abolished: See note to § 3-201.
D.C. Law 17-231 substituted “marriage or domestic partnership, as that term is defined in § 32-701(4),” for “marriage”.
Funeral and burial expenses, children in foster care or committed to the Youth Services Administration, see § 4-214.03.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2232 of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-91, July 22, 2019, 66 DCR 8497).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2232 of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-112, Sept. 4, 2019, 66 DCR 11964).
